text: Salvador Gabriel del Río de Angelis (born 2 October 1976) is a Spanish chess grandmaster. He won the Spanish Chess Championship in 2018. ==Chess career== Del Río was born in 1976 in Argentina. He earned his international master title in 1997 and his grandmaster title in 2002.FIDE Chess Profile: Del Rio De Angelis, Salvador G. FIDE He is the No. 14 ranked Spanish player as of August 2018. He won the Spanish Chess Championship in 2018. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Argentine chess players Category:Spanish chess players
title: Gabriel del Río
